screen:
-= Info about application 'AgentLogin' =-
[Synopsis] Call agent login
[Description] AgentLogin([AgentNo][,options]): Asks the agent to login to the system. Always returns -1. While logged in, the agent can receive calls and will hear a 'beep' when a new call comes in. The agent can dump the call by pressing the star key. The option string may contain zero or more of the following characters: 's' -- silent login - do not announce the login ok segment after agent logged on/off
